mapper.select: select parent_id,product_id,product_name,cost_price,amount,single_material_design_amount from production_process_material where parent_id in (select id from production_process where parent_id=#{id})

update.foreach: update production_process_material set renew_amount=renew_amount+(${productProfitLossDetails.profit_loss_amount}) where parent_id=#{production_process_id} and product_id=#{productProfitLossDetails.product_id}

mapper.select: select ppm.* , ppmc.use_amount as 'productionProcessMaterialCourse.use_amount', ppmc.id as 'productionProcessMaterialCourse.id', ppmc.cost_price as 'productionProcessMaterialCourse.cost_price' from production_process_material ppm inner join production_process_material_course ppmc on ppm.product_id=ppmc.product_id where ppm.parent_id=#{production_process_id} and ppmc.parent_id=#{production_process_course_id}

update.foreach: update production_process_material set real_amount=real_amount+${productionProcessMaterial.productionProcessMaterialCourse.use_amount}, real_subtotal=real_subtotal+ (${productionProcessMaterial.productionProcessMaterialCourse.use_amount}* ${productionProcessMaterial.productionProcessMaterialCourse.cost_price}) where id=#{productionProcessMaterial.id}
